div.p: International Maritime Industry Exhibition of Naples 1871

p.style: margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: start; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
The Royal Commission on the Proposal of the Upper Council of the Jury confers the Silver Medal 2nd Class on Van Mueller
i.e. Von Mueller. (Melbourne-Australia) for Collection of Timbers Group 4.
